Content:: Gamini Vijith Vijithamuni Soysa is a Sri Lankan politician. He was the Chief Minister of Uva Province in Sri Lanka from July 2004 to Aug 2009. He was elected to the Sri Lankan Parliament in 1989, 2000, 2001 and 2010 from Monaragala. [1] [2] [3][4][5][6]
Title: Gamini Vijith Vijithamuni Soysa - Wikipedia
